comments.en:
The Samsung CLP-315 (USB) and Samsung CLP-315W (Net) are color laser printers with a 2008 street price of $159 USD and $249 USD. This printer is compatible with the CLP-300 and is supported by the SpliX and foo2qpdl open software printer drivers. SpliX gives a better color output.

The CLP-315 is auto-detected as a CLP-310, but do not worry about that automatic printer setups use the PPD files for CLP-310, the two printers are compatible with each other.

Consumables/Refills: Toner Black (2000 prints) - $54, Toner Yellow (1000 prints) - $45, Toner Magenta (1000 prints) - $45, Toner Cyan (1000 prints) - $45, Waste Toner (5000 prints) - $10, Drum Kit (20000 prints) - $96 Part numbers: CLP-K300A, CLP-Y315A, CLP-M300A, CLP-C300A, CLP-W300A, CLP-R300A
